Prepare breakfast.cdl:
behavior boil_egg(egg:item, pot:item, stove:item, sink:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(egg, pot) # Put the egg in the pot
        
        if has_free_faucet_1(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            # Fill pot with water
            achieve has_water(pot)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
        
        achieve on(pot, stove) # Place the pot on the stove
        achieve is_on(stove) # Turn on the stove to boil the egg
functions:
def has_free_faucet_1(sink:item):
    # Check if there is a close faucet that is free or available
    symbol has_free_faucet=exists faucet:item : is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
    return has_free_faucet

Prepare breakfast.cdl:
behavior cook_chicken_and_pasta(pot:item, stove:item):
    body:
        if not has_food_chicken_and_pasta_inside_1(pot):
            foreach o: item:
                if is_food_chicken(o) or is_dry_pasta(o):
                    achieve_once inside(o, pot)
                    # Place chicken and pasta in the pot

        achieve on(pot, stove) # Place the pot on the stove
        achieve is_on(stove) # Turn on the stove to cook the chicken and pasta together
Prepare breakfast.source_sub_task: 1. Cook the chicken and pasta together.
functions:
def has_food_chicken_and_pasta_inside_1(pot:item):
    # Function to check if the pot contains chicken and pasta
    symbol has_food_chicken_and_pasta=exists o: item : (is_food_chicken(o) or is_dry_pasta(o)) and inside(o, pot)
    return has_food_chicken_and_pasta
